title: A Message from Bobby + BONUS: The Biztape: #51- Drake Dominates Charts, UMG goes Public, and Is Nashville Country Pop?
itunes:title: A Message from Bobby + BONUS: The Biztape: #51- Drake Dominates Charts, UMG goes Public, and Is Nashville Country Pop?
description:
Subscribe to The Biztape!


This week the boys welcome writer from Earmilk and owner of beatlymusic.com, Alexander Zwerner . The gang dives into how Drake continuously dominates charts upon every release as well as Universal Music Group’s insane first day of public trading. Later they discuss how Nashville country labels are partnering with their Pop counterparts as new crossover artists begin to flourish. This and more on The Biztape! 


Socials:  

Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok: @TheBiztape

Email: thebiztapepodcast@gmail.com



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
